    CalendarConverter  
    IdsGeneratorSource
    generates an SQL query which, run against a database, generates a list of IDs
    IReportEnvironment  
    ReportArea
    a generic structure describing an area of a report - be it a rectangular area (ColumnReportData) or a holder of subreports
    ReportExecutor
    a class which can execute a report
    ReportFilters  
    ReportSettings
    Stores Report Settings like currency to display, currency format, calendar type, year ranges to display and other.

    this defines a report specification, e.g.
    ReportVisitable
    Defines an interface for classes that may be interpreted by a Report Visitor.
    ReportVisitor
    A visitor for traversing an Report Area

    AmountsUnits

    Possible types of rules: a range filter (of values/ids), a single value filter (value/id), a list filter (of values/ids)
    Options:
    FilterRule.FilterType.RANGE
    FilterRule.FilterType.SINGLE_VALUE
    FilterRule.FilterType.VALUES
